an5.8:4.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:4.3: Assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:4.4: Ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:4.5: Anottappī, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:4.6: Kusīto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:4.7: Duppañño, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:4.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:5.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:5.3: Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:5.4: Hirīmā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:5.5: Ottappī, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:5.6: Āraddhavīriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:5.7: Paññavā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:5.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme”ti.
